item.title: How Trump Can Make The Nixonian Dream Of 1,000 Nuclear Power Plants A Reality
item.description: As we grapple with the twin challenges of energy security and energy reliability, revisiting Nixon’s vision offers valuable lessons.

item.title: Why Pete Hegseth Is The Right Man To Run The Pentagon
item.description: Hegseth is not only qualified but also uniquely positioned to lead in a time when bold, reform-minded leadership is desperately needed.

item.title: Now Is Not The Time For Senate Republicans To Play Nice On Biden’s Judicial Nominees
item.description: In the months before Trump assumes office, Democrats control the Senate, and President Biden has sent up a slew of hardcore leftist nominees.
